summary: Experienced Partner with a demonstrated history of working in the real estate industry. Strong entrepreneurship professional skilled in Negotiation, Retail, Feasibility Studies, Asset Management, and Market Analysis.

profile_positions.description:
Get the best out of your Real Estate !
Glint is offering a range of services regarding real estate and real estate development : strategic advice, acquisition, feasibility studies, concept development, re-development,  corporate solutions and interim management. Focus : Retail and Logistics;  Benelux, Germany,Central and Eastern Europe.
profile_positions.title: Partner

profile_positions.description:
Group Commercial Director Acteeum Group 
Acteeum is a  project development and asset management company in emerging markets,   starting in 2006 in mainly Turkey as well as the Ukraine, Georgia and –in a later stage Russia, Poland and Belarus.  Acteeum mainly deals with the development of shopping centres, occasionally with residential development.  
My activities and responsibilities within Acteeum :
•	Initiate/Scanning/research of new markets; apart from the above listed countries : 
        Romania, Bulgaria, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan.
•	Acquisition potential projects in cooperation with local teams
•	Definition of commercial concepts for development 
•	Estimation rental income
•	Conducting feasibility studies
•	Directing leasing process
profile_positions.title: Group Commercial Director

profile_positions.description:
My own company offering real estate related services to other companies in Central & Eastern Europe.  These services cover a wide spectrum,  with a focus on determining strategies, acquisition and development of real estate.  Clients of Sites & Vision :
•	Redevco Europe Services
•	Multi Development
•	Hanzevast
•	Bouwfonds Property Finance
•	RB Management 
•	Gdansk Retail Park Sp. z o.o 
•	Acteeum Group
•	Maastricht School of Management
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
In this position I  worked in Central and Eastern Europe:  Czech Republic, Poland, Slovakia, and the Baltic States.    
Prime tasks and responsibilities :
1. Expansion
•	Advice for setting-up and (re-)organizing local real estate departments 
•	Setting up processes within the real estate departments and decision-making procedures 
•	Developing location strategies for the formats and master plans for the large cities 
•	Building an international relation network 
•	Account manager for a number of large international developers 
•	Acquisition of locations for project development
•	Boost local expansion activities 

2. Project Leader in Poland  for  “Commercializing the Retail Environment” (CRE) 
This project aims to enhance the shopping experience of Ahold formats and shopping centres by : 
•	an improved consumer orientated branding of the shopping centres 
•	a significant increase of the footfall
•	higher spending in the shops 
•	an increase of consumer loyalty 
The objectives had to be realized in close co-operation with retail marketing and shopping centre management. Measures and actions are not only limited to the shops and the shopping centre itself, but are also implemented in a wider catchment area (the retail environment). We try to include local values into the actions generating active involvement of the inhabitants/consumers.

3. Project Leader for other new and strategic projects in Europe. 
I initiated a number of projects within the Operating Companies of Ahold in Europe in order to create synergies, such as :
•	A standardization project for small shopping centres, whereby through harmonisation, definition of the key-values for development, and through economies of scale substantial reductions in construction costs were achieved. 
•	Setting-up and working out policies and actions for reducing housing costs (rent), as well as realizing additional real estate income for Ahold supermarkets and hypermarkets.
profile_positions.title: Director Real Estate Europe

profile_positions.description:
I managed a team of 8 persons, consisting of senior and junior acquisition managers and property managers. Working area: the provinces of Groningen, Friesland, Drenthe, Overijssel, North Holland and Utrecht.
Prime responsibilities :
•	Acquisition of new projects 
•	Contribution to and evaluation of the location-strategy
•	Maintain and build up contacts with the prime developers, investors, real estate agents, and municipalities 
•	Management of  properties (leased and owned)

In this period I also have been active for Ahold in South-East Asia, where I was involved in setting up real estate departments and location strategies in China (Shanghai), Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand and Singapore.
profile_positions.title: Team Manager Acquisition and Property Management Ahold Real Estate

•	Build and maintain networks with developers, investors and real estate agents
